column1: Bavette's Bar & Boeuf////We stopped by one night unexpectedly and were unable to get a table. I made a reservation for my now fianc√©'s as a stop for her birthday celebration
column2: and we were successful. We had the steak tartare and steak frites
column3: amongst a few other dishes. Incredible. The server was fantastic
column4: and the experience for an early dinner was great overall. To be nice
column5: the only thing that stopped this review from getting 5 stars was that there was an unidentified object in our food --which we promptly told our server about. They were extremely apologetic
column6: and I was very surprised that even happened to us at such an establishment such as this. We understand that no place is perfect
column7: and they were more than accommodating about the issue. We really enjoyed the food
column8: and although we had a slight mishap
